Sentencas: A planar SOFC stack is an integral but basic power generation unit with physical conditions completely different from that of a laboratory button cell.
Titulo: A multiphysics fully coupled modeling tool for the design and operation analysis of planar solid oxide fuel cell stacks

Sentencas: The ability to reliably predict the operating behaviors of SOFC stacks is crucial for the technology advancement.
Titulo: A multiphysics fully coupled modeling tool for the design and operation analysis of planar solid oxide fuel cell stacks

Sentencas: The existing stack models either rely on simplified geometries, or handle a few selected fields that are relatively easy to couple.
Titulo: A multiphysics fully coupled modeling tool for the design and operation analysis of planar solid oxide fuel cell stacks

Sentencas: This paper reports the first successful development of a high geometry resolution, multiphysics fully coupled numerical model for production scale planar SOFC stacks.
Titulo: A multiphysics fully coupled modeling tool for the design and operation analysis of planar solid oxide fuel cell stacks

Sentencas: The computational model is developed through in-house developed multiphysics modules combined with commercial software FLUENT.
Titulo: A multiphysics fully coupled modeling tool for the design and operation analysis of planar solid oxide fuel cell stacks

Sentencas: All stack components such as flow channels, manifolds, cathode-electrolyte-anode assemblies, interconnects, seals and frames are resolved in the numerical grids.
Titulo: A multiphysics fully coupled modeling tool for the design and operation analysis of planar solid oxide fuel cell stacks

Sentencas: The mathematical model includes the fully coupled equations of momentum, mass, species, heat and charge transports, electrochemical reaction, and methane steam reforming and shift reactions.
Titulo: A multiphysics fully coupled modeling tool for the design and operation analysis of planar solid oxide fuel cell stacks

Sentencas: An accurate relationship between the O-2 transport and electrochemistry within the cathode-rib structure is established and used to enhance the numerical efficiency of the stack model.
Titulo: A multiphysics fully coupled modeling tool for the design and operation analysis of planar solid oxide fuel cell stacks

Sentencas: The stack model is validated with the experimental data.
Titulo: A multiphysics fully coupled modeling tool for the design and operation analysis of planar solid oxide fuel cell stacks

Sentencas: The numerical stability and modeling capability of this multiphysics stack model are illustrated by simulating a 30-cell stack of 27 million grid points.
Titulo: A multiphysics fully coupled modeling tool for the design and operation analysis of planar solid oxide fuel cell stacks

Sentencas: Detailed information about the distributions of flows, temperature, current and chemical species, etc, is revealed.
Titulo: A multiphysics fully coupled modeling tool for the design and operation analysis of planar solid oxide fuel cell stacks

Sentencas: Comparative studies show that the results obtained by simplifications of stack geometries or reductions of multiphysics couplings are unreliable, illustrating the necessity of employing a true multiphysics computational tool.
Titulo: A multiphysics fully coupled modeling tool for the design and operation analysis of planar solid oxide fuel cell stacks
